      • inflate

        public static byte[] inflate(byte[] ab,
                             int nOffs,
                             int nLen)
                      throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Inflates (uncompresses) a given byte array.
        Parameters:
        ab - The byte array to inflate.
        nOffs - An int containing the offset where to start inflating in the byte array.
        nLen - An int containing the length of bytes to inflate.
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the inflated data.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of problems with the data format.

                             int nOffs,

        nLen - An int containing the length of bytes to inflate.
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the inflated data.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of problems with the data format.

        public static void showInformation(java.lang.String strTitleId,
                                   java.lang.String strMessageId,
                                   java.lang.Object... args)
        Shows an information dialog with a message. Title and message will be taken from the language resources and probably filled with additional arguments.
        Parameters:
        strTitleId - A string containing a title id for lookup in the language resources.
        strMessageId - A string containing an id for lookup in the language resources.
        args - A variable arguments list with items to put into the message string.

      • showYesCancel

        public static javafx.scene.control.ButtonBar.ButtonData showYesCancel(java.lang.String strTitleId,
                                                                      java.lang.String strMessageId,
                                                                      java.lang.Object... args)
        Shows a Yes-Cancel dialog with a message. Title and message will be taken from the language resources and probably filled with arguments from the arguments list.
        Parameters:
        strTitleId - A string containing a title id for lookup in the language resources.
        strMessageId - A string containing an id for lookup in the language resources.
        args - A variable arguments list with items to put into the message string.
        Returns:
        An enumeration value of ButtonBar.ButtonData with the data of the button type the user pressed.
